title: UPI features like ATM withdrawals, circle likely to hit debit cards hard
description: Among the popular retail payment methods, debit cards have been on a significant decline over the last few years, but now with UPI being built for all forms of retail digital payments, some of the core use cases of these cards will also be challenged.
content: New features like cash withdrawals from ATMs and delegated payments for family members and friends could enable the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) to eat up a larger share of the debit card market, speeding up the decline of this traditional savings account-based payment instrument, according to industry executives.
